sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The grep package contains the egrep, fgrep and grep programs.

sect3.title: egrep
sect3.para: egrep prints lines from files matching an extended regular expression pattern.

sect3.title: fgrep
sect3.para: fgrep prints lines from files matching a list of fixed strings, separated by newlines, any of which is to be matched.

sect3.title: grep
sect3.para: grep prints lines from files matching a basic regular expression pattern.
